author: Lauren Egan
title: Pence helps graduate first Space Force officers at Air Force commencement
description: Family and friends were not allowed at this year’s ceremony and Vice President Mike Pence addressed the socially distanced class of graduating cadets.
content: WASHINGTON Vice President Mike Pence attended the 2020 commencement ceremony at the Air Force Academy in Colorado Springs on Saturday, making the trip outside of Washington amid the coronavirus pandemic to celebrate the very first graduating officers that wil… [+2168 chars]
